Room.Name: Caledonia Road/East Ulandia
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of Caledonia Road and East Ulandia.
Room.LongDescription: Caledonia Road crosses a bridge going west, and East Ulandia runs north and south parallel to the river. On the northeast corner there are a great many tents and temporary booths set up in a great outdoor fair. There are certainly a lot of people wandering around looking at things over there.
